MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure All Apple-provided Software Is Current
MacOS Ventura.command: /usr/bin/sudo /usr/sbin/softwareupdate -l

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Auto Update Is Enabled
MacOS Ventura.command:
/usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/osascript -l JavaScript << EOS
$.NSUserDefaults.alloc.initWithSuiteName('com.apple.SoftwareUpdate')
.objectForKey('AutomaticCheckEnabled').js
EOS

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Download New Updates When Available Is Enabled
MacOS Ventura.command:
/usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/osascript -l JavaScript << EOS
$.NSUserDefaults.alloc.initWithSuiteName('com.apple.SoftwareUpdate')
.objectForKey('AutomaticDownload').js
EOS

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure install of MacOS Updates is Enabled
MacOS Ventura.command:
/usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/osascript -l JavaScript << EOS
$.NSUserDefaults.alloc.initWithSuiteName('com.apple.SoftwareUpdate')
.objectForKey('AutomaticallyInstallMacOSUpdates').js
EOS

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Install Application Updates from the App Store Is Enabled
Ensure Install Security Responses and System Files Is Enabled
Ensure Software Update Deferment Is Less Than or Equal to 30 Days
MacOS Ventura.command:
result=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/osascript -l JavaScript << 'EOS'
$.NSUserDefaults.alloc.initWithSuiteName('com.apple.applicationaccess')
 .objectForKey('enforcedSoftwareUpdateDelay').js
EOS
)

if [ -z "$result" ]; then
echo "true"
elif [ "$result" -le 30 ]; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure the System is Managed by a Mobile Device Management (MDM) Software
MacOS Ventura.command: sudo /usr/bin/profiles status -type enrollment | /usr/bin/awk -F: '/MDM enrollment/ {print $2}' | /usr/bin/grep -c "Yes (User Approved)"

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure iCloud Drive Document and Desktop Sync Is Disabled
MacOS Ventura.command:
output=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/osascript -l JavaScript <<EOS
$.NSUserDefaults.alloc.initWithSuiteName('com.apple.applicationaccess').objectForKey('allowCloudDesktopAndDocuments').js
EOS
)

if [ -z "$output" ]; then
output1=$(/usr/bin/sudo -u "$(whoami)" /bin/ls -l /Users/"$(whoami)"/Library/Mobile\ Documents/com~apple~CloudDocs/Documents/ 2> /dev/null | /usr/bin/grep total)
output2=$(/usr/bin/sudo -u "$(whoami)" /bin/ls -l /Users/"$(whoami)"/Library/Mobile\ Documents/com~apple~CloudDocs/Desktop/ 2> /dev/null | /usr/bin/grep total)
fi

if [ -z "$output1" ] && [ -z "$output2" ]; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Firewall Is Enabled
Ensure Firewall Stealth Mode Is Enabled
Ensure AirDrop Is Disabled When Not Actively Transferring Files
Ensure AirPlay Receiver Is Disabled
Ensure Set Time and Date Automatically Is Enabled
MacOS Ventura.command: /usr/bin/sudo /usr/sbin/systemsetup -getusingnetworktime

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Time Is Set Within Appropriate Limits
MacOS Ventura.command: /usr/bin/sudo /usr/sbin/systemsetup -getnetworktimeserver | awk '{print $4}' | xargs -I {} /usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/sntp {} | awk '{if ($1 >= -270 && $1 <= 270) print "true"; else print "false"}'

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure DVD or CD Sharing Is Disabled
MacOS Ventura.command: /usr/bin/sudo /bin/launchctl list | grep -c com.apple.ODSAgent

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Screen Sharing Is Disabled
MacOS Ventura.command: /usr/bin/sudo /bin/launchctl list | grep -c com.apple.screensharing

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure File Sharing Is Disabled
MacOS Ventura.command: /usr/bin/sudo /bin/launchctl list | grep -c "com.apple.smbd"

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Printer Sharing Is Disabled
MacOS Ventura.command: /usr/bin/sudo /usr/sbin/cupsctl | grep -c "_share_printers=0"

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Remote Login Is Disabled
MacOS Ventura.command: /usr/bin/sudo /usr/sbin/systemsetup -getremotelogin

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Remote Management Is Disabled
MacOS Ventura.command:
if /usr/bin/sudo /bin/ps -ef | /usr/bin/grep -e ARDAgent | grep -v grep > /dev/null; then
echo "false"
else
echo "true"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Remote Apple Events Is Disabled
MacOS Ventura.command: /usr/bin/sudo /usr/sbin/systemsetup -getremoteappleevents

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Internet Sharing Is Disabled
MacOS Ventura.command:
output=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/osascript -l JavaScript << EOS
$.NSUserDefaults.alloc.initWithSuiteName('com.apple.MCX')
.objectForKey('forceInternetSharingOff').js
EOS
)

if [ -z "$output" ]; then
enabledOutput=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/defaults read /Library/Preferences/SystemConfiguration/com.apple.nat | awk '/Enabled/ {i++; if(i==2) print; }')

if [[ $enabledOutput =~ "Enabled = 1" ]]; then
echo "false"
elif [[ $enabledOutput =~ "Enabled = 0" ]]; then
echo "true"
fi
else
  echo "$output"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Content Caching Is Disabled
Ensure Media Sharing Is Disabled
Ensure Bluetooth Sharing Is Disabled
MacOS Ventura.command:
output=$(/usr/bin/sudo -u $(whoami) /usr/bin/defaults -currentHost read com.apple.Bluetooth PrefKeyServicesEnabled 2>/dev/null)

if [ -z "$output" ]; then
echo "true"
elif [[ "$output" == "0" ]]; then
echo "true"
elif [[ "$output" == "1" ]]; then
echo "false"
else
echo "true"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Time Machine Volumes Are Encrypted If Time Machine Is Enabled
MacOS Ventura.command: /usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/defaults read /Library/Preferences/com.apple.TimeMachine.plist | grep -c NotEncrypted

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Show Wi-Fi status in Menu Bar Is Enabled
MacOS Ventura.command:
output=$(/usr/bin/sudo -u $(whoami) /usr/bin/defaults -currentHost read com.apple.controlcenter.plist WiFi 2>/dev/null)

if [ -z "$output" ]; then
echo "true"
elif [[ "$output" == "2" ]]; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Show Bluetooth Status in Menu Bar Is Enabled
MacOS Ventura.command:
output=$(/usr/bin/sudo -u $(whoami) /usr/bin/defaults -currentHost read com.apple.controlcenter.plist Bluetooth 2>/dev/null)

if [ -z "$output" ]; then
echo "true"
elif [[ "$output" == "18" ]]; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Limit Ad Tracking Is Enabled
MacOS Ventura.command:
output=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/osascript -l JavaScript << EOS
$.NSUserDefaults.alloc.initWithSuiteName('com.apple.MCX')
.objectForKey('forceInternetSharingOff').js
EOS
)

if [ -z "$output" ]; then
enabledOutput=$(/usr/bin/sudo -u $(whoami) /usr/bin/defaults read /Users/$(whoami)/Library/Preferences/com.apple.AdLib.plist allowApplePersonalizedAdvertising)

if [[ $enabledOutput == "0" ]]; then
echo "false"
else
echo "true"
fi
else
echo "$output"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Gatekeeper Is Enabled
MacOS Ventura.command: /usr/bin/sudo /usr/sbin/spctl --status

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure FileVault Is Enabled
MacOS Ventura.command: /usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/fdesetup status

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure an Administrator Password Is Required to Access System-Wide Preferences
MacOS Ventura.command:
authDBs=("system.preferences" "system.preferences.energysaver"
 "system.preferences.network" "system.preferences.printing"
 "system.preferences.sharing" "system.preferences.softwareupdate"
 "system.preferences.startupdisk" "system.preferences.timemachine")
result="1"

for section in "${authDBs[@]}"; do
if [[ $(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/security -q authorizationdb read "$section" | /usr/bin/xmllint -xpath 'name(//*[contains(text(), "shared")]/following-sibling::*[1])' -) != "false" ]]; then
result="0"
fi
done

echo $result

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Power Nap Is Disabled for Intel Macs
MacOS Ventura.command: /usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/pmset -g custom | /usr/bin/grep -c "powernap'\s+'1"

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Wake for Network Access Is Disabled
MacOS Ventura.command:
output=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/pmset -g custom | /usr/bin/grep "womp")

total_womp_count=0
womp_zero_count=0

while IFS= read -r line; do
if [[ "$line" =~ womp ]]; then
((total_womp_count++))
if [[ "$line" =~ womp[[:space:]]+0 ]]; then
((womp_zero_count++))
fi
fi
done <<< "$output"

if [[ $total_womp_count -eq $womp_zero_count ]]; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure an Inactivity Interval of 20 Minutes Or Less for the Screen Saver Is Enabled
Ensure Require Password After Screen Saver Begins or Display Is Turned Off Is Enabled for 5 Seconds or Immediately
Ensure a Custom Message for the Login Screen Is Enabled
MacOS Ventura.command:
output=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/osascript -l JavaScript <<'EOS'
$.NSUserDefaults.alloc.initWithSuiteName('com.apple.loginwindow')
.objectForKey('LoginwindowText').js
EOS
)

if [ -z "$output" ]; then
echo "false"
else
echo "true"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Login Window Displays as Name and Password Is Enabled
MacOS Ventura.command:
output=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/osascript -l JavaScript <<EOS
$.NSUserDefaults.alloc.initWithSuiteName('com.apple.loginwindow')
.objectForKey('SHOWFULLNAME').js
EOS
)

if [ -z "$output" ] || [ "$output" = "false" ]; then
echo "false"
else
echo "true"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Show Password Hints Is Disabled
MacOS Ventura.command:
output=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/osascript -l JavaScript << EOS
$.NSUserDefaults.alloc.initWithSuiteName('com.apple.loginwindow')
.objectForKey('RetriesUntilHint').js
EOS
)

if [ -z "$output" ] || [ "$output" = "0" ]; then
echo "true"
else
  echo "false"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Users' Accounts Do Not Have a Password Hint
MacOS Ventura.command:
output=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/dscl . -list /Users hint . -list /Users hint)
if [ -z "$output" ]; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Guest Account Is Disabled
Ensure Guest Access to Shared Folders Is Disabled
MacOS Ventura.command:
output=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/sbin/sysadminctl -smbGuestAccess status 2>&1)
if echo "$output" | grep -q "SMB guest access disabled"; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Automatic Login Is Disabled
Ensure Backup Automatically is Enabled If Time Machine Is Enabled
Ensure Location Services Is Enabled
MacOS Ventura.command:
/usr/bin/sudo -u _locationd /usr/bin/osascript -l JavaScript << EOS
$.NSUserDefaults.alloc.initWithSuiteName('com.apple.locationd').objectForKey('LocationServicesEnabled').js
EOS

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Location Services Is in the Menu Bar
MacOS Ventura.command:
output=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/osascript -l JavaScript << EOS
$.NSUserDefaults.alloc.initWithSuiteName('com.apple.locationmenu')
.objectForKey('ShowSystemServices').js
EOS
)

if [ "$output" = "true" ]; then
cho "true"
else
echo "false"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Sending Diagnostic and Usage Data to Apple Is Disabled
Ensure Screen Saver Corners Are Secure
MacOS Ventura.command:
result=true

output_tl=$(/usr/bin/sudo -u "$(whoami)" /usr/bin/defaults read com.apple.dock wvous-tl-corner)
if [ "$output_tl" = "6" ]; then
result=false
fi

output_bl=$(/usr/bin/sudo -u "$(whoami)" /usr/bin/defaults read com.apple.dock wvous-bl-corner)
if [ "$output_bl" = "6" ]; then
result=false
fi

output_tr=$(/usr/bin/sudo -u "$(whoami)" /usr/bin/defaults read com.apple.dock wvous-tr-corner)
if [ "$output_tr" = "6" ]; then
result=false
fi

output_br=$(/usr/bin/sudo -u "$(whoami)" /usr/bin/defaults read com.apple.dock wvous-br-corner)
if [ "$output_br" = "6" ]; then
result=false
fi

echo "$result"

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure the OS Is Not Active When Resuming from Standby (Intel)
MacOS Ventura.command:
result=true

if /usr/sbin/sysctl -n machdep.cpu.brand_string | /usr/bin/grep -q "Intel"; then

if /usr/bin/sudo /usr/sbin/system_profiler SPHardwareDataType | /usr/bin/grep -q "MacBook"; then
standby_info=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/pmset -b -g | /usr/bin/grep -e standby)

standbydelaylow=$(echo "$standby_info" | /usr/bin/grep -o 'standbydelaylow [0-9]*' | cut -d ' ' -f 2)
standbydelayhigh=$(echo "$standby_info" | /usr/bin/grep -o 'standbydelayhigh [0-9]*' | cut -d ' ' -f 2)
highstandbythreshold=$(echo "$standby_info" | /usr/bin/grep -o 'highstandbythreshold [0-9]*' | cut -d ' ' -f 2)

if [ -z "$standbydelaylow" ] || [ "$standbydelaylow" -gt 900 ] || [ -z "$standbydelayhigh" ] || [ "$standbydelayhigh" -gt 900 ] || [ -z "$highstandbythreshold" ] || [ "$highstandbythreshold" -lt 90 ]; then
result=false
fi

hibernatemode=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/pmset -b -g | /usr/bin/grep -o 'hibernatemode [0-9]*' | cut -d ' ' -f 2)
if [ -z "$hibernatemode" ] || [ "$hibernatemode" != "25" ]; then
result=false
fi
else
result=false
fi
fi

echo "$result"

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure the OS Is Not Active When Resuming from Sleep and Display Sleep (Apple Silicon)
MacOS Ventura.command:
result=true

if /usr/bin/sudo /usr/sbin/system_profiler SPHardwareDataType | /usr/bin/grep -q -e MacBook; then

result=true

pm_settings=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/pmset -g)

sleep_value=$(echo "$pm_settings" | /usr/bin/grep -E "sleep\s+[0-9]+" | awk '{for(i=1;i<=NF;i++){if($i=="sleep"){print $(i+1)}}}')
if [ -z "$sleep_value" ] || [ "$sleep_value" -gt 15 ]; then
result=false
fi

displaysleep_value=$(echo "$pm_settings" | /usr/bin/grep "displaysleep" | awk '{print $2}')
if [ -z "$displaysleep_value" ] || [ "$displaysleep_value" -gt 10 ] || [ "$displaysleep_value" -gt "$sleep_value" ]; then
result=false
fi

hibernatemode_value=$(echo "$pm_settings" | /usr/bin/grep "hibernatemode" | awk '{print $2}')
if [ -z "$hibernatemode_value" ] || [ "$hibernatemode_value" != "25" ]; then
result=false
fi

echo "$result"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure FileVault is Locked on Sleep
MacOS Ventura.command:
if /usr/bin/sudo /usr/sbin/system_profiler SPHardwareDataType | /usr/bin/grep -q -e MacBook; then

result=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/pmset -b -g | /usr/bin/grep DestroyFVKeyOnStandby)
if [ "$result" = "DestroyFVKeyOnStandby 1" ]; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Security Auditing Is Enabled
MacOS Ventura.command:
output=$(/usr/bin/sudo /bin/launchctl list | /usr/bin/awk '$2 == 0 && $3 == "com.apple.auditd"')
if [[ -n "$output" ]]; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Security Auditing Flags For User-Attributable Events Are Configured Per Local Organizational Requirements
MacOS Ventura.command:
compliant="true"
required_flags=("ad" "aa" "lo")
failed_event_flags=("-fm" "-ex" "-fr" "-fw")

current_flags=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/grep -e "^flags:" /etc/security/audit_control)

contains_flag() {
[[ $current_flags =~ $1 ]] && return 0 || return 1
}

if contains_flag "-all"; then
for flag in "${required_flags[@]}"; do
if ! contains_flag "$flag"; then
compliant="false"
fi
done
else
for flag in "${required_flags[@]}" "${failed_event_flags[@]}"; do
if ! contains_flag "$flag"; then
compliant="false"
fi
done
fi

echo "$compliant"

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure install.log Is Retained for 365 or More Days and No Maximum Size
MacOS Ventura.command:
ttl_output=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/grep -i ttl /etc/asl/com.apple.install)
all_max_output=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/grep -i all_max= /etc/asl/com.apple.install)
if echo "$ttl_output" | grep -q "ttlâ‰¥365" && [[ -z "$all_max_output" ]]; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Security Auditing Retention Is Enabled
MacOS Ventura.command:
output=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/grep -e "^expire-after" /etc/security/audit_control)
value=$(echo "$output" | cut -d ':' -f2 | xargs)
number=$(echo "$value" | grep -o -E '[0-9]+')
unit=$(echo "$value" | grep -o -E '[a-zA-Z]+')
meets_criteria=false
if [[ $unit == "G" && $number -ge 5 ]]; then
echo "true"
elif [[ $unit == "d" && $number -ge 60 ]]; then
echo "true"
elif [[ $unit == "M" && $number -ge 5120 ]]; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Firewall Logging Is Enabled and Configured
Ensure Bonjour Advertising Services Is Disabled
MacOS Ventura.command:
/usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/osascript -l JavaScript << EOS
$.NSUserDefaults.alloc.initWithSuiteName('com.apple.mDNSResponder')
.objectForKey('NoMulticastAdvertisements').js
EOS

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure HTTP Server Is Disabled
MacOS Ventura.command: /usr/bin/sudo /bin/launchctl list | /usr/bin/grep -c "org.apache.httpd"

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure NFS Server Is Disabled
MacOS Ventura.command:
nfsd_count=$(/usr/bin/sudo /bin/launchctl list | /usr/bin/grep -c com.apple.nfsd)
exports_exists=$(/usr/bin/sudo /bin/cat /etc/exports 2>&1)
if [[ "$nfsd_count" -eq 0 && "$exports_exists" == "cat: /etc/exports: No such file or directory" ]]; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Home Folders Are Secure
MacOS Ventura.command:
output=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/find /System/Volumes/Data/Users -mindepth 1 -maxdepth 1 -type d -not -perm 700 | /usr/bin/grep -v "Shared" | /usr/bin/grep -v "Guest")
if [[ -z "$output" ]]; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure System Integrity Protection Status (SIP) Is Enabled
MacOS Ventura.command:
output=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/csrutil status)
if [[ "$output" == "System Integrity Protection status: enabled." ]]; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Apple Mobile File Integrity (AMFI) Is Enabled
MacOS Ventura.command: /usr/bin/sudo /usr/sbin/nvram -p | /usr/bin/grep -c "amfi_get_out_of_my_way=1"

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Sealed System Volume (SSV) Is Enabled
MacOS Ventura.command:
output=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/csrutil authenticated-root status)
if [[ "$output" == "Authenticated Root status: enabled" ]]; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Appropriate Permissions Are Enabled for System Wide Applications
MacOS Ventura.command: /usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/find /System/Volumes/Data/Applications -iname "*\.app" -type d -perm -2 -ls | grep -v Xcode.app | /usr/bin/wc -l | /usr/bin/xargs

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure No World Writable Folders Exist in the System Folder
MacOS Ventura.command: /usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/find /System/Volumes/Data/System -type d -perm -2 -ls | /usr/bin/grep -v "downloadDir" | /usr/bin/wc -l | /usr/bin/xargs

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure No World Writable Folders Exist in the Library Folder
MacOS Ventura.command:
output=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/find /System/Volumes/Data/Library -type d -perm -2 -ls 2> /dev/null | /usr/bin/grep -v Caches | /usr/bin/grep -v /Preferences/Audio/Data | /usr/bin/wc -l | /usr/bin/xargs)

if [ "$output" = 0 ]; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Password Account Lockout Threshold Is Configured
MacOS Ventura.command:
max_attempts_output=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/pwpolicy -getaccountpolicies 2> /dev/null | /usr/bin/grep "policyAttributeMaximumFailedAuthentications")
max_attempts=$(echo $max_attempts_output | /usr/bin/cut -d'>' -f2 | /usr/bin/cut -d '<' -f1)
max_attempts_result=false
if [[ "$max_attempts" != "" && "$max_attempts" -le 5 ]]; then
max_attempts_result=true
fi
lockout_minutes_output=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/pwpolicy -getaccountpolicies 2> /dev/null | /usr/bin/grep "policyAttributeMinutesUntilFailedAuthenticationReset")
lockout_minutes=$(echo $lockout_minutes_output | /usr/bin/cut -d'>' -f2 | /usr/bin/cut -d '<' -f1)
lockout_time_result=false
if [[ "$lockout_minutes" != "" && "$lockout_minutes" -ge 15 ]]; then
lockout_time_result=true
fi
if [[ "$max_attempts_result" == true && "$lockout_time_result" == true ]]; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Password Minimum Length Is Configured
MacOS Ventura.command:
output=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/pwpolicy -getaccountpolicies | /usr/bin/grep -e "policyAttributePassword matches" | /usr/bin/cut -b 46-53 | /usr/bin/cut -d',' -f1 | /usr/bin/cut -d'{' -f2)
if [ "$output" -ge 15 ]; then
echo "true"
else
  echo "false"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Complex Password Must Contain Alphabetic Characters Is Configured
MacOS Ventura.command:
pref1=$(/usr/bin/pwpolicy -getaccountpolicies | /usr/bin/grep -e "Contain at least one number and one alphabetic character." | cut -b 13-68)
pref2=$(/usr/bin/pwpolicy -getaccountpolicies | /usr/bin/grep -A1 minimumLetters | /usr/bin/tail -1 | /usr/bin/cut -d'>' -f2 | /usr/bin/cut -d '<' -f1)

if [ "$pref1" = "Contain at least one number and one alphabetic character" ]; then
echo "true"
elif [[ "$pref2" != "" && $pref2 -ge 1 ]]; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Complex Password Must Contain Numeric Character Is Configured
MacOS Ventura.command:
pref1=$(/usr/bin/pwpolicy -getaccountpolicies | /usr/bin/grep -e "Contain at least one number and one alphabetic character." | cut -b 13-68)
pref2=$(/usr/bin/pwpolicy -getaccountpolicies | /usr/bin/grep -A1 minimumNumericCharacters | /usr/bin/tail -1 | /usr/bin/cut -d'>' -f2 | /usr/bin/cut -d '<' -f1)

if [ "$pref1" = "Contain at least one number and one alphabetic character" ]; then
echo "true"
elif [[ "$pref2" != "" && $pref2 -ge 1 ]]; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Complex Password Must Contain Special Character Is Configured
MacOS Ventura.command:
pref1=$(/usr/bin/pwpolicy -getaccountpolicies | /usr/bin/grep -e "policyAttributePassword matches '(.*[^a-zA-Z0-9].*){1,}'" | cut -b 12-67)
pref2=$(/usr/bin/pwpolicy -getaccountpolicies | /usr/bin/grep -A1 minimumSymbols | /usr/bin/tail -1 | /usr/bin/cut -d'>' -f2 | /usr/bin/cut -d '<' -f1)

if [ "$pref1" = "policyAttributePassword matches '(.*[^a-zA-Z0-9].*){1,}'" ]; then
echo "true"
elif [[ "$pref2" != "" && $pref2 -ge 1 ]]; then
echo "true"
else 
echo "false"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Complex Password Must Contain Uppercase and Lowercase Characters Is Configured
MacOS Ventura.command:
pref=$(/usr/bin/pwpolicy -getaccountpolicies | /usr/bin/grep -A1 minimumMixedCaseCharacters | /usr/bin/tail -1 | /usr/bin/cut -d'>' -f2 | /usr/bin/cut -d '<' -f1)

if [[ "$pref" != "" && $pref -ge 1 ]]; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Password Age Is Configured
MacOS Ventura.command:
pref1=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/pwpolicy -getaccountpolicies | /usr/bin/grep -A1 policyAttributeExpiresEveryNDays | /usr/bin/tail -1 | /usr/bin/cut -d'>' -f2 | /usr/bin/cut -d '<' -f1) &&
pref2=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/pwpolicy -getaccountpolicies | /usr/bin/grep -A1 policyAttributeDaysUntilExpiration | /usr/bin/tail -1 | /usr/bin/cut -d'>' -f2 | /usr/bin/cut -d '<' -f1) && 
[[ ("$pref1" != "" && "$pref1" -le 365) || ("$pref2" != "" && "$pref2" -le 365) ]] && echo "true" || echo "false"

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Password History Is Configured
MacOS Ventura.command:
pref=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/pwpolicy -getaccountpolicies | /usr/bin/grep -A1 policyAttributePasswordHistoryDepth | /usr/bin/tail -1 | /usr/bin/cut -d'>' -f2 | /usr/bin/cut -d '<' -f1)
if [[ "$pref" != "" && "$pref" -ge 1 ]]; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure all user storage APFS volumes are encrypted
MacOS Ventura.command:
output=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/sbin/diskutil apfs list)
all_encrypted=true
while IFS= read -r line; do
if [[ "$line" == *"FileVault:"* ]]; then
fv_status=$(echo "$line" | awk -F "FileVault: " '{print $2}' | awk '{print $1}')
if [[ "$fv_status" == "No" ]]; then
all_encrypted=false
break
fi
fi
done <<< "$output"
if $all_encrypted; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure all user storage CoreStorage volumes are encrypted
MacOS Ventura.command:
output=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/sbin/diskutil cs list)
encrypted=true
if [[ "$output" != "No CoreStorage logical volume groups found" ]]; then
echo "$output" | while read -r line; do
if [[ "$line" == *"Encryption Status:"* && "$line" != *"Unlocked"* ]]; then
encrypted=false
break
fi
done
fi
if $encrypted; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure the Sudo Timeout Period Is Set to Zero
MacOS Ventura.command:
timeout_check=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/sudo -V | /usr/bin/grep -c "Authentication timestamp timeout: 0.0 minutes")
ownership_check=$(/usr/bin/stat /etc/sudoers.d | awk '{print $5, $6}')
if [[ "$timeout_check" -eq 1 && "$ownership_check" == "root wheel" ]]; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure a Separate Timestamp Is Enabled for Each User/tty Combo
MacOS Ventura.command: /usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/sudo -V | /usr/bin/grep -c "Type of authentication timestamp record: tty"

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure the root Account Is Disabled
MacOS Ventura.command:
output=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/dscl . -read /Users/root AuthenticationAuthority 2>&1)
if [[ "$output" == "No such key: AuthenticationAuthority" ]]; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure an Administrator Account Cannot Login to Another User's Active and Locked Session
MacOS Ventura.command: /usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/security authorizationdb read system.login.screensaver 2>&1 | /usr/bin/grep -c 'use-login-window-ui'

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure a Login Window Banner Exists
MacOS Ventura.command:
compliant="false"

policy_banner_files=$(sudo find /Library/Security -name "PolicyBanner.*" 2> /dev/null)

if [[ -n $policy_banner_files ]]; then
all_files_compliant="true"

for file in $policy_banner_files; do
permissions=$(sudo /usr/bin/stat -f %A "$file")
third_digit=${permissions:2:1}
if [[ $third_digit != "4" ]]; then
all_files_compliant="false"
break
fi
done

if [[ $all_files_compliant == "true" ]]; then
compliant="true"
fi
fi

echo "$compliant"

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Legacy EFI Is Valid and Updating
MacOS Ventura.command:
processor_brand=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/sbin/sysctl -n machdep.cpu.brand_string)
if [[ "$processor_brand" == *"Apple"* ]]; then
echo "true"
else
t2_check=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/sbin/system_profiler SPiBridgeDataType | grep "T2")
efi_check_output=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/libexec/firmwarecheckers/eficheck/eficheck --integrity-check)
eficheck_daemon_check=$(/usr/bin/sudo /bin/launchctl list | /usr/bin/grep com.apple.driver.eficheck)
if [[ "$t2_check" == *"Model Name: Apple T2 Security Chip"* && "$efi_check_output" == *"Primary allowlist version match found. No changes detected in primary hashes." && "$eficheck_daemon_check" == "- 0 com.apple.driver.eficheck" ]]; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure the Guest Home Folder Does Not Exist
MacOS Ventura.command:
output=$(/usr/bin/sudo /bin/ls /Users/ | /usr/bin/grep Guest)
if [[ -z "$output" ]]; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure XProtect Is Running and Updated
MacOS Ventura.command: sudo /bin/launchctl list | /usr/bin/grep -cE "(com.apple.XprotectFramework.PluginService$|com.apple.XProtect.daemon.scan$)"

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Show All Filename Extensions Setting is Enabled
MacOS Ventura.command:
output=$(/usr/bin/sudo -u "$(whoami)" /usr/bin/defaults read /Users/"$(whoami)"/Library/Preferences/.GlobalPreferences.plist AppleShowAllExtensions 2> /dev/null)
if [[ "$output" = "1" ]]; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Automatic Opening of Safe Files in Safari Is Disabled
MacOS Ventura.command:
output=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/sbin/system_profiler SPConfigurationProfileDataType | /usr/bin/grep AutoOpenSafeDownloads | /usr/bin/tr -d ' ' 2> /dev/null)
if [[ -n "$output" ]]; then
if [[ "$output" = "AutoOpenSafeDownloads = 0;" ]]; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi
else
output2=$(/usr/bin/sudo -u "$(whoami)" /usr/bin/defaults read /Users/"$(whoami)"/Library/Containers/com.apple.Safari/Data/Library/Preferences/com.apple.Safari AutoOpenSafeDownloads 2> /dev/null)
if [[ "$output2" = "0" ]]; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Warn When Visiting A Fraudulent Website in Safari Is Enabled
MacOS Ventura.command:
output=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/sbin/system_profiler SPConfigurationProfileDataType | /usr/bin/grep WarnAboutFraudulentWebsites | /usr/bin/tr -d ' ' 2> /dev/null)
if [[ -n "$output" ]]; then
if [[ "$output" = "WarnAboutFraudulentWebsites = 1;" ]]; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi
else
output2=$(/usr/bin/sudo -u "$(whoami)" /usr/bin/defaults read /Users/"$(whoami)"/Library/Containers/com.apple.Safari/Data/Library/Preferences/com.apple.Safari WarnAboutFraudulentWebsites 2> /dev/null)
if [[ "$output2" = "0" ]]; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Prevent Cross-site Tracking in Safari Is Enabled
MacOS Ventura.command:
policy1=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/sbin/system_profiler SPConfigurationProfileDataType | /usr/bin/grep BlockStoragePolicy | /usr/bin/tr -d ' ' 2> /dev/null)
policy2=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/sbin/system_profiler SPConfigurationProfileDataType | /usr/bin/grep WebKitPreferences.storageBlockingPolicy | /usr/bin/tr -d ' ' 2> /dev/null)
policy3=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/sbin/system_profiler SPConfigurationProfileDataType | /usr/bin/grep WebKitStorageBlockingPolicy | /usr/bin/tr -d ' ' 2> /dev/null)
if [[ -n "$policy1" ]] && [[ -n "$policy2" ]] && [[ -n "$policy3" ]]; then
if [[ "$policy1" == "BlockStoragePolicy=2;" ]] && [[ "$policy2" == "WebKitPreferences.storageBlockingPolicy=1;" ]] && [[ "$policy3" == "WebKitStorageBlockingPolicy=1;" ]]; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi
else
policy1=$(/usr/bin/sudo -u "$(whoami)" /usr/bin/defaults read /Users/"$(whoami)"/Library/Containers/com.apple.Safari/Data/Library/Preferences/com.apple.Safari BlockStoragePolicy 2> /dev/null)
policy2=$(/usr/bin/sudo -u "$(whoami)" /usr/bin/defaults read /Users/"$(whoami)"/Library/Containers/com.apple.Safari/Data/Library/Preferences/com.apple.Safari WebKitPreferences.storageBlockingPolicy 2> /dev/null)
policy3=$(/usr/bin/sudo -u "$(whoami)" /usr/bin/defaults read /Users/"$(whoami)"/Library/Containers/com.apple.Safari/Data/Library/Preferences/com.apple.Safari WebKitStorageBlockingPolicy 2> /dev/null)
if [[ "$policy1" == "2" ]] && [[ "$policy2" == "1" ]] && [[ "$policy3" == "1" ]]; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Audit Hide IP Address in Safari Setting
MacOS Ventura.command:
username="$(whoami)"

output=$(sudo -u "$username" defaults read /Users/"$username"/Library/Containers/com.apple.Safari/Data/Library/Preferences/com.apple.Safari WBSPrivacyProxyAvailabilityTraffic 2> /dev/null)

if [[ $output == 33422564 || $output == 33422572 ]]; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Advertising Privacy Protection in Safari Is Enabled
MacOS Ventura.command:
output=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/sbin/system_profiler SPConfigurationProfileDataType | /usr/bin/grep "WebKitPreferences.privateClickMeasurementEnabled" | /usr/bin/tr -d ' ' 2> /dev/null)
if [[ -n "$output" ]] && [[ "$output" == "\"WebKitPreferences.privateClickMeasurementEnabled\" = 1;" ]]; then
echo "true"
else
output=$(/usr/bin/sudo -u "$(whoami)" /usr/bin/defaults read /Users/"$(whoami)"/Library/Containers/com.apple.Safari/Data/Library/Preferences/com.apple.Safari WebKitPreferences.privateClickMeasurementEnabled 2> /dev/null)
if [[ "$output" == "1" ]]; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Show Full Website Address in Safari Is Enabled
MacOS Ventura.command:
output=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/sbin/system_profiler SPConfigurationProfileDataType | /usr/bin/grep ShowFullURLInSmartSearchField | /usr/bin/tr -d ' ' 2> /dev/null)
if [[ -n "$output" ]] && [[ "$output" == "ShowFullURLInSmartSearchField=1;" ]]; then
echo "true"
else
output=$(/usr/bin/sudo -u "$(whoami)" /usr/bin/defaults read /Users/"$(whoami)"/Library/Containers/com.apple.Safari/Data/Library/Preferences/com.apple.Safari ShowFullURLInSmartSearchField 2> /dev/null)
if [[ "$output" == "1" ]]; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Pop-up Windows Are Blocked
MacOS Ventura.command:
output=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/sbin/system_profiler SPConfigurationProfileDataType | /usr/bin/grep safariAllowPopups | /usr/bin/tr -d ' ')
if [[ -n "$output" ]] && [[ "$output" == "safariAllowPopups=0;" ]]; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Javascript Is Enabled
MacOS Ventura.command:
output=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/sbin/system_profiler SPConfigurationProfileDataType | /usr/bin/grep WebKitPreferences.javaScriptEnabled | /usr/bin/tr -d ' ')
if [[ -n "$output" ]] && [[ "$output" == "WebKitPreferences.javaScriptEnabled = 1;" ]]; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Show Status Bar Is Enabled
MacOS Ventura.command:
output=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/sbin/system_profiler SPConfigurationProfileDataType | /usr/bin/grep ShowOverlayStatusBar | /usr/bin/tr -d ' ')
if [[ -n "$output" ]] && [[ "$output" == "ShowOverlayStatusBar = 1;" ]]; then
  echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi

MacOS Ventura.title: Ensure Secure Keyboard Entry Terminal.app Is Enabled
MacOS Ventura.command:
output=$(/usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/osascript -l JavaScript << EOS
$.NSUserDefaults.alloc.initWithSuiteName('com.apple.Terminal')
.objectForKey('SecureKeyboardEntry').js
EOS
)
if [[ -n "$output" ]] && [[ "$output" == "true" ]]; then
echo "true"
else
output=$(/usr/bin/sudo -u "$(whoami)" /usr/bin/defaults read -app Terminal SecureKeyboardEntry)
if [[ "$output" == "1" ]]; then
echo "true"
else
echo "false"
fi
fi
